ClassDesc: Interface for receiving events about media routing changes. All methods of this interface will be called from the application's main thread. A Callback will only receive events relevant to routes that the callback was registered for unless the @B_android#media#MediaRouter#CALLBACK_FLAG_UNFILTERED_EVENTS_E@ flag was specified in @B_android#media#MediaRouter#addCallback_E@.
